title: Extended by Popular Demand: Malaysia Beachside Sanctuary with All-Inclusive Dining & Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Tucked away on Malaysia's unspoiled east coast, this extraordinary sanctuary - a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection - offers an escape inspired by the country's magnificent palaces of old. Part royal estate, part jungle hideaway, this tropical paradise offers direct access to one of the best beaches in the country.

Take advantage of treatments inspired by the concept of Sucimurni (the purity of health, spirit and wellbeing) at the Spa Village, set sail on foodie adventures at Di Atas Sungei or Nelayan, and lounge around a pool that looks like it's been plucked straight from a travel magazine. Whether you're after total zen or adventure with a capital A, this resort has something for every taste.
offer_address: Batu 8, Off Jalan Dungun, 23000 Dungun, Terengganu, Malaysia
